thumb.title: Do you need home insurance during settlement?
thumb.description: For anyone buying a home, making sure you’re insured is vital. Home and contents insurance could provide you with peace of mind that comes with believing you’re covered for all sorts of situations. The reality is that, at some stage during your settlement journey, your property or its contents could be seriously affected or damaged, and, as the new owner, everything that happens to the property could be your responsibility. But what should you consider when choosing insurance and when is the best time in the sale-to-settlement process for you to get it? We have set out some key information below.Reference: https://www.conveyancing.com.au/articles/home-insurance-coverage
